settings.title: Walk. Lean back. Stand. Repeat
settings.subtitle: Walkolution therefore built the first motorless, silent, and mobile treadmill with an integrated desk which offers an attractive, compact, and healthy alternative for office work.

settings.title: Virtually silence use
settings.subtitle: Therefore distraction-free use in quiet work areas possible.

settings.title: The first of its kind
settings.subtitle: LIKE WALKING ON A SOFT FOREST FLOOR
settings.content: The MTD900 Kybun marks the pinnacle of the treadmill product category and combines the perfected art of Walkolution manufacture with the most innovative materials of the fitness industry.
settings.link_text: Learn more about the Kybun series

settings.title: Feel supported in any position with adjustable features
settings.subtitle: 4 different adjustable heights in integrated desks

settings.title: HIGH TECH MANUFACTURING MEETS SUSTAINABILITY
settings.subtitle: walkolution forest
settings.content:
We produce all products in our own high-tech manufacturing facility in Bavaria, Germany and attach greatest importance to sustainable production methods and only use highest-quality raw materials from trusted sources, such as FSC-certified wood from well managed German forestries.

To underline our sustainability efforts, for every product sold, Walkolution plants 10 trees in certified projects around the globe.

settings.title:
Award winning
Design
settings.text: The design of the products has already been recognized with first prizes in several international design competitions, including the German Design Award, the International Design Award and recently the iF Design Award.

Integrated award winning desk, depth adjustable
Which Walkolution is right for you?

settings.title1: Upgrade your home-office with a new category of furniture
settings.subtitle1: Use your Walkolution anywhere and not just for work. You don't need electricity and can therefore use it in the garden, on the terrace or on the balcony.
settings.title2: A new concept to reinvent your workplace
settings.subtitle2: Staying effortlessly in motion throughout the day and thus keeping the body healthy is the key to productivity in our modern working world.

settings.title: Modular design to suit any use
settings.subtitle: You can easily adapt your Walkolution and upgrade your product with a few simple steps and without tools.

settings.text: 30 days to see how it works

settings.title: Try it at home for 30 days worry-free
High-tech wood or Kybun®-Foam
settings.subtitle: The Walkolution treadmill is available in two versions: On the 300, 700 and 800 models, you walk on slightly elastic wooden slats made of break-proof and stable birch wood, which come with a sound-reducing and wipeable protective coating. Ideal when wearing shoes, but equally suitable for walking barefoot.

settings.title: Desk variants and standing aid
settings.subtitle: All versions are available either completely without a desk (e.g. to combine with your own height-adjustable desk), with our excellent and well-proven integrated table (Wanderlust series) or with the innovative freestanding table ( Ära series). All Walkolution products are modular, so you can also modify and retrofit the different versions at a later date.
